question.title: Identify the clinical sign most commonly associated with OAIs in children and adults.
question.description: Which of the following is a common clinical sign of OAIs?

option_a.title: Fever usually absent
option_a.description: Fever is typically absent in OAIs

option_b.title: C-reactive protein elevation (CRP)
option_b.description: CRP is often elevated in OAIs

option_c.title: Abnormal scar (discharge, disunion, necrosis)
option_c.description: Abnormal scars can occur post-operatively in OAIs

option_d.title: Post-operative acute pain
option_d.description: Post-operative pain is a common symptom of OAIs

correct_option.title: C
correct_option.description: The correct option is denoted by a letter (e.g. A, B, C, or D)
